name: ingress-nginx-end-of-life
description: Detects usage of ingress-nginx controller which will reach end-of-life in March 2026. After this date, no further releases, bugfixes, or security updates will be provided.
remediation: Migrate to Gateway API (the modern replacement for Ingress) or choose an alternative Ingress controller. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/services-networking/ingress-controllers/ for a list of alternatives.
